menu.oauth2_info: If you leave the password field blank, PinkSea will use OAuth2 to log into your PDS. It is generally more secure than password login.

response_box.click_to_respond: Click to open the drawing panel

painter.do_you_want_to_restore: The last upload has errored out and your image has been saved. Do you want to restore it?
painter.could_not_send_post: There was an issue uploading the post. Please try again later. Your post has been saved in your browser, it will be restored the next time you'll enter the painter menu.
painter.your_session_has_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again. Your post has been saved in your browser, it will be restored the next time you'll enter the painter menu.
painter.hint_description: Attaching a short description helps give context about your drawing. Optional.
painter.hint_tags: Give your post up to five tags to help others discover it! For example: characters (koiwai_yotsuba), copyrights (yotsubato! / oc) or general information (portrait). Optional.
painter.hint_nsfw: Please check if your post contains adult content such as nudity or highly suggestive themes.
painter.hint_xpost: If checked, we'll automatically create a post for you on Bluesky with the image and a link to PinkSea attached.
painter.hint_confirm: Once you're ready, click the button above to publish your image!
painter.hint_edit: Need to adjust the image before uploading? Click the button to go back to the editor.

profile_edit.how_others_will_see_you: This is how others will see you
profile_edit.nickname_description: This is the name others will identify you by. By default, it's equal to your handle.
profile_edit.your_bio_description: This is your bio. It's a short piece of text that's visible on your profile. By default, it's empty.
profile_edit.avatar_description: Select an avatar from the list of oekaki you've drawn!
profile_edit.link_name_description: This is the name of the link you're creating.
profile_edit.link_url_description: This is the url of the link you're creating.

tegakijs.hiddenActiveLayer: The active layer is not visible.
tegakijs.confirmCancel: Are you sure? Your work will be lost.
tegakijs.confirmChangeCanvas: Are you sure? Changing the canvas will clear all layers and history and disable replay recording.
tegakijs.paletteSlotReplace: Right click to replace with the current color
